data.name: Stray Purery Street
data.desc: Your opponent cannot target "Purery" monsters you control with card effects during the turn they were Special Summoned. Once per turn, if a face-up "Purery" Xyz Monster(s) you control leaves the field by an opponent's card: Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Purery" monster from your Deck or GY. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can target 1 "Purery" Xyz Monster on the field; attach 1 "Purery" Quick-Play Spell from your Deck or GY to it as material.
